alert.note: Alert for Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:40PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lafayette, northeastern Taylor and southern Madison Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 240 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles west of Madison to 7 miles west of Mayo. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lee, Townsend, Moseley Hall, Ebb, Chancey, Smith, Hopewell, Buckville, Day, Mayo Junction and Sirmans. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
